# Unweighted

## Data Pre-Processing

```{r}
# compute statistical power for each (statistic, simulation, effect size, nvertices) pair
uw.power.dat <- read.csv('./data/uw_block_est.csv') %>%
   select(-X) %>%
   rename(FET_pval=FET, Chi2_pval=Chi2, LRT_pval=LRT, DCorr_pval=DCorr, KW_pval=KW, ANOVA_pval=ANOVA) %>%
   pivot_longer(FET_pval:ANOVA_pred, names_to=c("Statistic", ".value"), names_pattern="(.+)_(.+)") %>%
   group_by(Simulation, Weighting, n, Effect_Size, Statistic) %>%
   mutate(Power=(pred == Simulation & pval < .05)) %>%
   summarize(Power=mean(Power, na.rm=TRUE)) %>%
   ungroup() %>%
   group_by(Simulation, Weighting, n, Statistic) %>%
   mutate(Effect_Size=round((Effect_Size - min(Effect_Size))/(max(Effect_Size) - min(Effect_Size)), digits=3)) %>%
   ungroup() %>%
   mutate(Effect_Size=factor(Effect_Size, levels=sort(unique(Effect_Size)), ordered=TRUE),
         n=factor(n, levels=sort(unique(n)), ordered=TRUE)) %>%
   filter(Statistic == "Chi2") %>%
   mutate(Simulation=recode_factor(Simulation, "abba"="Planted Partition", "abbd"="Sym. Het.",
                               "abcd"="Asy. Het."))

# grab the simulation examples for each setting
uw.gr.dat <- read.csv('./data/uw_graph.csv') %>%
  mutate(Row=factor(Row), Column=factor(Column), Weight=factor(Weight), 
         Method=factor(Method, levels=c("abba", "abbd", "abcd"), ordered=TRUE)) %>%
   mutate(Method=recode_factor(Method, "abba"="Planted Partition", "abbd"="Sym. Het.",
                               "abcd"="Asy. Het."))

# pull out power at nvertices == 56
uw.fixedn.dat <- uw.power.dat %>%
  filter(n == 50)

pow.cols <- c('#f7f6f6', '#f7f5f4', '#f8f4f2', '#f8f3f0', '#f8f1ed', '#f9f0eb', '#f9efe9', '#f9eee7', '#f9ebe3', '#faeae1', '#fae9df', '#fae8de', '#fbe6da', '#fbe5d8', '#fbe4d6', '#fce2d2', '#fce0d0', '#fcdfcf', '#fcdecd', '#fddcc9', '#fddbc7', '#fdd9c4', '#fcd7c2', '#fcd3bc', '#fbd0b9', '#fbceb7', '#fbccb4', '#fac8af', '#f9c6ac', '#f9c4a9', '#f8bfa4', '#f8bda1', '#f8bb9e', '#f7b99c', '#f7b596', '#f6b394', '#f6b191', '#f6af8e', '#f5aa89', '#f5a886', '#f4a683', '#f3a481', '#f19e7d', '#f09c7b', '#ef9979', '#ec9374', '#eb9172', '#ea8e70', '#e98b6e', '#e6866a', '#e58368', '#e48066', '#e37e64', '#e17860', '#df765e', '#de735c', '#dd7059', '#db6b55', '#da6853', '#d86551', '#d6604d', '#d55d4c', '#d35a4a', '#d25849', '#cf5246', '#ce4f45', '#cc4c44', '#cb4942', '#c84440', '#c6413e', '#c53e3d', '#c43b3c', '#c13639', '#bf3338', '#be3036', '#bb2a34', '#ba2832', '#b82531', '#b72230', '#b41c2d', '#b3192c', '#b1182b', '#ae172a', '#a81529', '#a51429', '#a21328', '#9f1228', '#991027', '#960f27', '#930e26', '#8d0c25', '#8a0b25', '#870a24', '#840924', '#7f0823', '#7c0722', '#790622', '#760521', '#700320', '#6d0220', '#6a011f')
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=3}
uw.sim.plt <- ggplot(data=uw.gr.dat, mapping=aes(x=Row, y=Column, fill=Weight)) +
   geom_tile() +
   facet_grid(".~Method", switch="y") +
   xlab("Vertex 1") + 
   ylab("Vertex 2") + 
   scale_x_discrete(breaks=c(1, 50)) + 
   scale_y_discrete(breaks=c(1, 50), limits=rev(levels(gr.dat$Column))) +
   scale_fill_manual(values=c(`0`=pow.cols[1], `1`=pow.cols[length(pow.cols)]), name="Edge", labels=c("Y", "N"), breaks=c(1, 0)) +
   theme_bw() +
   ggtitle("I.(A) Simulations") +
   theme(plot.margin=unit(c(0,.2,0,0), "cm"))
uw.sim.plt
```

```{r, fig.width=7, fig.height=3}
uw.hmap.plt <- ggplot(data=uw.power.dat, mapping=aes(x=n, y=Effect_Size, fill=Power)) +
   geom_tile() + 
   facet_grid(". ~ Simulation") + 
   xlab("Number of Vertices") + 
   ylab("Effect Size") + 
   scale_fill_gradientn(colors=pow.cols, name="Power", breaks=c(0, .5, 1)) + 
   scale_x_discrete(breaks=c(20, 100)) + 
   scale_y_discrete(breaks=c(0,1)) + 
   theme_bw() + 
   ggtitle("I.(B) Power Maps") +
   theme(strip.background.x = element_blank(), strip.text.x = element_blank()) +
   theme(plot.margin=unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm"))
uw.hmap.plt
```

```{r}
alpha=.05
uw.fixedn.plt <- ggplot(data=uw.fixedn.dat, mapping=aes(x=as.numeric(as.character(Effect_Size)), y=Power,
                                                        color=factor(Statistic), group=factor(Statistic))) + 
   geom_line() +
   facet_grid("Simulation~.") +
   xlab("Relative Effect Size") +
   ylab("Power") +
   scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(0,.5, 1)) +
   scale_y_continuous(limits=c(0,1), breaks=c(0,1)) +
   scale_color_discrete(name="Test") +
   geom_hline(mapping=aes(yintercept=alpha)) +
   theme_bw() +
   ggtitle("I.(C) Power Plots, n=50") +
   theme(strip.background = element_blank(), strip.text.y = element_blank()) +
   guides(color=FALSE)
uw.fixedn.plt
```
